title: Flipped Learning-Based Neurosurgery Medical Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Flipped Learning Course in Smartphone-Centric Limited Technology Environments. Students Learn Pre-Produced Short Video Materials and Engage in Discussions and Hands-On Projects in Project-Based Classes

learning_goals: Medical students achieve mastery of core concepts by viewing flipped learning videos under five minutes in length at a rate of 90% or higher
Learners confirm conceptual understanding by responding to embedded quizzes in videos at a rate of 75% or higher
Students analyze neurosurgical clinical cases through PBL activities and achieve participation rates of 80% or higher

resources: Video player with embedded quiz functionality
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
